title: TeXQuarto
section: 1 TeX Snippets used in a TeX block

title: TeXQuarto
text:
2 Theorems in a TeX Block
Test Tex block
\[\begin{align*}
  & \int_0^2 (3x^2+1) dx \\
  &= {x^3} + x {\Big|}_0^2  \\
  &= (2^3 +2) - (0^3 + 0) \\
  &= 10 -(0) = 10 \qquad \blacksquare
\end{align*}\]

title: TeXQuarto

title: TeXQuarto
section: 2 Theorems are written using div code-blocks
text:
2 Theorems are written using div code-blocks

#thm-line is used in div-ID to cross reference Theorem 1
tex-blocks are used to display equations within div
.proof is a class with the div block


Theorem 1 For any events A, B and C, defined on a sample space \(S\),
\[\begin{array}{l l}
a. Commutativity    & A \cup B = B \cup A,\\
                    & A \cap B = B \cap A;\\
b. Associativity    & A \cup (B \cup C) = (A \cup B)\cup C,\\
                    & A \cap (B \cap C) = (A \cap B)\cap C,\\
\end{array}\]
